name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Selection: Salaryman Kintarou - Slotter Kintarou - Ore no Sora
name_original: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Selection: Salaryman Kintarou - Slotter Kintarou - Ore no Sora
description: A virtual slots game for the PlayStation 2 that simulates three pachi-slot machines: Salaryman Kintarou, Slotter Kintarou, and Ore no Sora.
